nodes.text: The Chandrilans were a cultural group of humans who called the planet of Chandrila home. They were regarded as peaceful but slightly haughty, pedantic, and interested in politics. Following the Imperial Era, some Chandrilans disliked former Imperials. Prominent Chandrilan individuals included Senator Mon Mothma and Ben Solo.
Chandrilan women like Mon Mothma were known to favor simple hairstyles.
